com.l2fprod.common.swing
Class JDirectoryChooser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JFileChooser
                  com.l2fprod.common.swing.JDirectoryChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class JDirectoryChooser
extends javax.swing.JFileChooser

An extension of the JFileChooser but dedicated to directory selection.

See Also:
Serialized Form
